abstract: PepsiCo and the Pepsi Bottling Group said on Thursday they have agreed to buy 75.53 percent of the juice business of Lebedyansky, Russia’s leading juice producer, for $1.4 billion.
lead_paragraph: PepsiCo and the Pepsi Bottling Group said on Thursday they have agreed to buy 75.53 percent of the juice business of Lebedyansky, Russia’s leading juice producer, for $1.4 billion.

headline.main: Pepsi to Buy Majority Stake in Russian Juice Maker
